extendedInfo.description: If you are Duran Duran's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Duran Duran's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Duran Duran's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Duran Duran's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Duran Duran- Rio- Seven and the Ragged Tiger- Arena- Notorious- Big Thing- Liberty- The Wedding Album- Thank You- Medazzaland- Pop Trash- Astronaut- Red Carpet Massacre- All You Need Is Now--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- (Reach Up For The) Sunrise- 911 Is A Joke- A Matter Of Feeling- All Along The Water- All She Wants Is- All You Need
